DOC.brief_summary: The CHICA system is a clinical decision support system that uses adaptive turnaround documents to provide point-of-care information to clinicians. The investigators will be studying whether it can help to support parents in their efforts to quit smoking.
DOC.brief_title: Using Computers to Assist in Parental Smoking Cessation in a Pediatric Setting
DOC.detailed_description: The CHICA system is a clinical decision support system that uses adaptive turnaround documents to provide point-of-care information to clinicians. The investigators will be studying in a randomized controlled trial whether it can help to support parents in their efforts to quit smoking.
DOC.criteria: Parent of child in our clinics who reported cigarette smoking Not smoking
